item.title: Linux Cheat Sheet
item.description: shell find files 1 2 3 4 find ./fuzz-results/crashes -type f -name "id:$1*" -print0 | while read -d $'\0' file do echo $file done xargs 多行转单行输入, 默认分隔符为换行 1 pacman -Q | grep -i "haskell" | xargs sudo pacman -S --noconfirm placeholder 1 2 xargs -I {} mv dir1/{} dir2/{} xargs -I '{}' mv dir1/'{}' dir2/'{}' stream symbol meanings 0 stdin 1 stdout 2 stderr 2>&1 stderr to stdout 1> stdout redirect 2> stderr redirect 1>/dev/null write to void uniq 仅输出 unique 行

item.title: Org Cheat Shell
item.description:
configuration reveal.js 1 #+REVEAL_THEME: Serif all 1 2 3 #+OPTIONS: broken-links:t 
:t #+LATEX_HEADER: \hypersetup{colorlinks=true,linkcolor=black} #+SETUPFILE: /home/yayu/org/org-html-themes/org/theme-readtheorg-local.setup 连接 1 #+OPTIONS: broken-links:t 
:t 换行 1 #+OPTIONS: 
:t TOC 颜色 1 #+LATEX_HEADER: \hypersetup{colorlinks=true,linkcolor=black} HTML theme
